data.title: FTD Mercury Technology Solutions
data.meta_description: Introducing FTD's cutting-edge technology solutions designed to empower florists and elevate their businesses with innovative tools. Say hello to Mercury HQ, a best-in-class, cloud-based shop management platform, and Mercury Online website, powered by Shopify, the leading e-commerce solution in the market today.
data.text:
Introducing FTD's cutting-edge technology solutions designed to empower florists and elevate their businesses with innovative tools. Say hello to Mercury HQ, a best-in-class, cloud-based shop management platform, and Mercury Online website, powered by Shopify, the leading e-commerce solution in the market today.

Mercury HQ, a cloud-based shop management platform, allows you to manage your business from anywhere. It was developed with the needs of florists in mind, empowering floral shop users with comprehensive tools to efficiently manage every aspect of their operations. From order management and real-time delivery confirmations to customer management and robust reports, Mercury HQ equips florists with the resources they need to thrive in today's competitive market.

A complement to Mercury HQ, Mercury Online is a dynamic web platform created by FTD in collaboration with Shopify. It offers florists a modern, user-friendly interface to easily customize the site with local products and content. Tailored specifically for flower shops, this platform provides an intuitive shopping experience designed to convert more sales. Mercury Online is seamlessly integrated with Mercury HQ to update shop settings and pricing in real-time.
